byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: DealBook Online; Teva Pharmaceutical Industries switches legal advisers in its move for Mylan, dropping Kirkland & Ellis after judge recommended doing so.
lead_paragraph: Teva dropped the law firm Kirkland & Ellis as an adviser in its effort to buy Mylan after a judge recommended that the firm be stripped of its role.

headline.main: Law Firm a Casualty of a Takeover Battle

snippet: Teva dropped the law firm Kirkland & Ellis as an adviser in its effort to buy Mylan after a judge recommended that the firm be stripped of its role.
